block.p: Mary Frazier Holt, a daughter of Marjorie and John Holt of Newport News, Va., was married there yesterday to Bruce David Schulman, a son of Susan and Dr. Paul Schulman of Westport, Conn. The ceremony was performed at St. Andrew's Episcopal Church by the Rev. Howard Saunders.

Mrs. Schulman, 30, is known as Frazier. She is a consultant in New York at McKinsey & Company, the management consultants. She graduated from Georgetown University and received an M.B.A. from the University of Virginia. Her father is a salesman for Harper & Company, a janitorial and pool supplies company in Newport News. Her mother retired as a guidance counselor at Hines Middle School in Newport News.

Mary Frazier Holt, a daughter of Marjorie and John Holt of Newport News, Va., was married there yesterday to Bruce David Schulman, a son of Susan and Dr. Paul Schulman of Westport, Conn. The ceremony was performed at St. Andrew's Episcopal Church by the Rev. Howard Saunders.

Mrs. Schulman, 30, is known as Frazier. She is a consultant in New York at McKinsey & Company, the management consultants. She graduated from Georgetown University and received an M.B.A. from the University of Virginia. Her father is a salesman for Harper & Company, a janitorial and pool supplies company in Newport News. Her mother retired as a guidance counselor at Hines Middle School in Newport News.

Mr. Schulman, 30, is an associate in the venture capital and private investment division of J. P. Morgan & Company in New York. A cum laude graduate of Harvard University, he received an M.B.A. from the University of Pennsylvania and a master's degree in international affairs from Johns Hopkins University. His father, a retired hematologist and oncologist, practiced in Norwalk, Conn., and was the chief of hematology and oncology at Norwalk Hospital.
